item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "There are moments that define a person's whole life. Moments in which everything they are and everything they may possibly become balance on a single decision. Life and death, hope and despair, victory and failure teeter precariously on the decision made at that moment. These are moments ungoverned by happenstance, untroubled by luck. These are the moments in which a person earns the right to live, or not." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Go then, there are other worlds than these." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "Sometimes people say terrible things when they're scared. They don't mean to, but they can't help it. They lash out because if they can see that their words hurt someone else, it makes them feel as if they aren't completely powerless." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "When you have to kill the same terrorist twice in one week, then there's either something wrong with your skills or something wrong with your world. And there's nothing wrong with my skills." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by William G.T. Shedd
item.description: "A ship is safe in harbor, but that's not what ships are for." -- William G.T. Shedd

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "Often it was the most unlikely people who found within themselves a spark of something greater. It was probably always there, but most people are never tested, and they go through their whole lives without ever knowing that when things are at their worst, they are at their best." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "Closure isn't closure until someone's ready to close the door." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "They won the war but lost the peace," -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "Revenge is an infection of the spirit." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "That's stupid." "That's people." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "There are moments that define a person's whole life. MOMENTS in which everything they are and everything they may possibly become hinge on a single decision." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "Chong said, 'Do yourself a favor, Morg. Next time you're staring at a girl's boobs, look up. You'll be shocked to learn it, but there's going to be a face up there. Nose, mouth, eyes. And behind the eyes is an actual person." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "The truth is the truth. What changes is what we know about it and what we're willing to believe." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "Everyone carries around his own monsters.---Richard Pryor" -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "There was a sliver of moon and a splash of stars, and the light outlined her face and glistened on the tears that ran like mercury down her cheeks." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "Suffering is easier to endure when shared." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "This one looks good,” said Chong over breakfast the next morning. Benny read out loud from the paper. “‘Pit Thrower.’ What’s that?” “I don’t know,” Chong said with a mouth full of toast. “I think it has something to do with barbecuing.” It didn’t." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "You have to keep your mind as wide-open as your eyes, because almost nothing is what it seems." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "Point is, people lie a lot. Sometimes out of habit. Not many people are good at telling the truth." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "They held each other and wept as the night closed its fist around their tiny shelter, and the world below them seethed with killers both living and dead." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "Language." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "She wept for the hurt that he owned, a hurt she could never hope to remove." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "We had the whole 'when you assume you make an ass out of you and me' speech in school." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "It's just that I'm fifteen, and I have this crazy idea I might actually have a life in front of me. I don't see how it's going to do me much good to believe that the world is over and this is just an epilogue." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "I don't ever want to live in a world where something like mercy...or maybe it's compassion...is the <i>wrong</i> choice." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "Boy, there are people who conquered half the world, slaughtered whole populations, wiped cultures off the face of the planet, and you know what history calls them? Heroes! Kings, presidents, champions, explorers. You think America was settled by white men because the Indians invited us her? No, we took this land because we were stronger, and that's how every page of human history is written. It's just our nature. We're a predator species, top of the food chain. Survival of the fittest is written in our blood, it's stenciled on every gene of our DNA. The strong take and the strong make, and the weak are there only to help them do it. End of story." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "Things said and done innocently should never be used as weapons." -- Jonathan Maberry

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jonathan Maberry
item.description: "The world is bigger and harder to understand than you think... You have to keep your mind as wide-open as your eyes, because almost nothing is what it seems." -- Jonathan Maberry
